The Straw Hats Pirates

Luffy

The Straw Hat

Name: Monkey D Luffy
Age: 19
Role: Captain
Bounty: 1,500,000,000 Beli

Monkey D. Luffy, born in Foosha a small remote village found in the East Blue. He is the son to Monkey D. Dragon the leader of the most wanted criminal group in the world, the Revolutionary Army. Dragon decided to leave Luffy in the care of his grandfather Monkey D. Garp, a famous Vice-Admiral who was known to be the Hero of the Navy. At the age of 6, Shanks and The Red Hair Pirates stationed themselves in Foosha village. Luffy wanted to join The Red Hair Pirates after they had been in the village for almost a year. His grandfather Garp obviously was opposed to the idea of Luffy becoming a pirate as he wanted him to become a strong marine and to fight for the Navy.

Due to unforseen events, Luffy somehow ended up eating the Gomu Gomu No Mi. a Devil Fruit that Shanks brought to the village which ened up turning Luffy into a rubber man. Later on when the Red Hair Pirates decided to leave Foosha for good. Luffy decided that he did not want to go with them, but instead he wanted to build his own pirate crew and on that day Luffy declared to Shanks that he was going to become a great pirate, capable of forming a crew stronger than his. And in response, Shanks gave Luffy his Straw Hat, telling him to return it once he had become a great pirate.

Since then Luffy has made his way throughout the first half of the Grand Line with the help of his crew. He had been part of many important events and ended up with a 400,000,000 Beli Bounty. Today Luffy can be found in the second half of the Grand Line, Battling it out with the strongest pirates in the One Piece universe and is slowly but surely making his dream of becoming a pirate great enough to surpass Shanks and his Crew and ultimately become the King of the Pirates.

Zoro

The Pirate Hunter

Name: Roronoa Zoro
Age: 21
Role: Combatant
Bounty: 320,000,000 Beli

Roronoa Zoro is a swordsman who trained at a dojo in Shimotsuki, a village found in the East Blue. As a child Zoro was capable of beating most adults but could never beat Kuina, the Dojomaster's daughter. After fighting her 2000 times and losing each time he finally challenged her to a fight with real swords. Even after giving it his all, he still could not win. Even after being faced with the fact of losing 2001 times all to the same person, Zoro told Kuina about his dream of becoming the world's best swordsman. After hearing what Zoro had said, she admitted to him that they share the same dream, but knew that it was impossible for her since her father had always said that girls could never be true sword masters and her fighting potential would decrease as her body matured. Zoro, annoyed by Kuina's pessimistic attitude inspite of repeatedly winning against him, told her that one day he would beat her because he was more skilled, not because she was a girl. On that day they both made a promise that either of them had to become the world's best swordsman.

The next day, Kuina suffered a fatal fall down the stairs and much to Zoro's anger and disappointment. Realising that she would never have the chance to fulfill her dream, Zoro took it upon himself fulfill his and her dream for the two of them. He was the second member of the Straw Hat crew and was asked to join because luffy believed that he was a good man and the fact that he had also made a name for himself as the Pirate Hunter, definitely helped.

Today, Zoro is known for his great swordsmanship, particularly the three-sword style and for being the right-hand man to Luffy, He is currently worth 320,000,000 Beli and is part of the group known to be in the same group of his captain: the Worst Generation, He is considered to be the second and if not, one of the strongest members in the Straw Hat Pirate Crew.

Nami

Cat Burglar

Name: Nami
Age: 20
Role: Navigator
Bounty: 66,000,000 Beli

Nami is an orphan from the Oykot kingdom, she was found by Bellemere, a female marine, on the battlefield when she was still a baby, carrying her was a random girl who found her amidst the battlefield. Bellemere saw this and made sure they were safe, after escaping the battlefield, Bellemere decided to adopt Nami and Nojiko and stayed in Cocoyashi, a village in East Blue. the three became close almost like a real family.

Growing up Nami developed a love for drawing maps and navigation, her ultimate dream was to draw a complete map of the world. She built her reputation of Cat Burglar by stealing almost 100,000,000 Beli worth of treasure from pirates and commonfolk alike. After a long complicated story Nami ended up joining the Straw Hats as their permanent navigator technically becoming the 5th Member of the group, However she did join the crew before Sanji and Usopp did so most people say that she is number 3.

Though what she doesnt make up for in combat, she makes up with her navigation skills. She is the sole reason why the Straw Hats are able to navigate through the Grand Line. Even after learning about controlling the weather and using it as a weapon and with a bounty of 66,000,000 she is considered to be the weakest member of the crew.

Usopp

God

Name: Usopp
Age: 19
Role: Sniper
Bounty: 200,000,000 Beli

Usopp bornn in Syrup, a village found in the East blue, his father is the sniper of the Red-Hair Pirates, Shanks's crew. He met Luffy after his ship landed on the coast of his village. Since luffy was a pirate, Usopp pretended to be a pirate captain in order to scare Luffy and his crew away. Luffy did not fall for it and immediately laughed at usopp for trying his tricks. Luffy Zoro and Nami entered the village and quickly became friends with Usopp. After a long ordeal with the Butler of Usopp's childhood friend Kaya. The Straw Hats were awarded their very first real ship: The Going Merry. After packing his bags and hoping to set off on his own Journey, Luffy asked him to join his Crew, simply because they were friends. Usopp in disbelief, accepted his request and officially became the 4th member of the crew

Since then Usopp even though seen as cowardly at times, has proven to be a valuable member of the group he is often debated to be the weakest or the 2nd weakest of the group, though he may be considered weak, He is certainly not useless. Due to his actions leading up to the end of Dressrosa he has racked up a high bounty of 200,000,000 Beli and the hilarious title of God.

Sanji

Black Leg

Name: Vinsmoke Sanji
Age: 21
Role: Chef
Bounty: 330,000,000 Beli
